channel.title: Point System Server
channel.description:
I don't know where to post this, but this section will do.
Q. Are there currently any decent point system servers that look like they'll actually last for a while? I used to play the original google.com (oh, the name of the server is censored, but I think that most people would know what I'm talking about), and since that ended I've always been on the lookout for other servers like it, but all I've found during the years after are a few crappy servers that always have a major flaw (corrupt mods, stupid custom items etc etc).
If anybody knows of a server that uses a point system and actually has a half decent player base, please let me know about it.
Sorry if this is posted in the wrong section.

item.title: Point System Server
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

snoopy89:

*

Posting material like that is sick, enjoy your mute.

@OP, check out the advertisement section, you should find a decent server in there. I’ll have to lock this thread as it isn’t related to this section.

Read full topic
